Dear Harry:
As we review your proposal for a continuation of financial
support we are wondering if you have taken any steps to
organize your Association so that it can receive and administer
direct Foundation funds which would entitle you to a certificate
from the Internal Revenue Service indicating your qualifications
for receiving tax exempt funds. I notice that throughout the
period of our grant the University of Illinois has served as
your fiscal agent. Is it also serving as your fiscal agent for
funds which you receive from other foundations? Perhaps your
Association has a policy with respect to a development which
would lead to your own certification from the Internal Revenue
Service.
Sincerely,
